name: Bridge Wizard
description:
PLAY IT FULLSCREEN!

You're a wizard and you want no one crossing your bridge. Defend it from trespasers with spells! 

After using a spell, the next  will combine with the previous one, creating a different spell than the original. Try out every combination!

My entry for Mini Jam #41: Magic. Quite rushed, as I wasn't able to add every spell combination or different types of enemies. Might work on it in the future, who knows.

Everything made by me except the sprites.

Project on GitHub: https://github.com/Ebediam/Magic
